path.description: Relative path of the zip file in the server that contains the library

thumbnail.description: Relative url where the thumbnail for this resource library is placed

author.description: Information for the author (or authors) that created the resources of the library

items.description: Information associated to the licenses of the resources contained in the library

numberOfElements.description: The number of resources (objects, characters, etc.) the library contains

size.description: The downloadable amount of mega bytes of the zip file associated to the library. If -1, the size is unknown

description.description: A brief description of the library

tags.description: A list of tags - useful for searching and grouping resources

description: A simple editor component to describe libraries of elements that are meant to be shared together and reused through the repository.
